entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 01:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %

Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
